title: Best of the Program | Guests: Jason Buttrill & Eric Fellman | 12/10/21
description:
Glenn previews his Friday Exclusive with Bo Snerdley, the right-hand man of Rush Limbaugh. Jason Buttrill joins Glenn and Stu to discuss Glenn’s upcoming sit-down with President Trump and a past interview with a former president. Eric Fellman joins to discuss how his tragic story with a miraculous ending inspired the Hallmark movie “A Godwink Christmas.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
